name: DownRiver
description:
DownRiver is a little puzzle game I've developed in my spare time. It's short and simple: turn tiles to find a way for the river to flow.  It also contains some commentary text about my thoughts, and so it's more of an art piece(maybe?) than a game. 

The game might not be running well on your web browser so I've also included a downloadable .zip (PC-Windows) and .apk (Android) that you can install on your Windows desktop or Android phone.

Thanks for Playing! <3
